query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_stats,
  COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(date)) as unique_days,
  SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'approved' THEN CAST(calculated_revenue AS DECIMAL(10,2)) ELSE 0 END) as total_revenue
FROM daily_stats 
WHERE employee_id = 300001 
AND MONTH(date) = 1 
AND YEAR(date) = 2026;
